feature.desktopCapturer.headline: Pilih perkara yang hendak dikongsikan
Anda akan menurunkan taraf ke akaun Percuma kami. Adakah anda pasti? Sebaliknya, klik di sini untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak perkhidmatan dan fungsi dengan hanya {currency}{price} sebulan.
feature.planSelection.fullscreen.subhead: Sudah tiba masanya untuk membuat pilihan. Franz berfungsi dengan baik pada rancangan Peribadi dan Profesional kami. Sila lihat dan pilih yang terbaik untuk anda.
feature.planSelection.personal.text: Lebih banyak perkhidmatan, tanpa menunggu - sesuai untuk kegunaan peribadi.
feature.planSelection.pro.text: Perkhidmatan tanpa had dan ciri profesional untuk anda - dan pasukan anda.
feature.serviceLimit.limitReached: Anda telah menambah {amount} daripada {limit} perkhidmatan yang disertakan dalam pelan anda. Sila menaikkan taraf akaun anda untuk menambah lebih banyak perkhidmatan.
feature.shareFranz.headline: Franz lebih elok digunakan bersama-sama rakan
feature.shareFranz.shareText.email: Saya telah menambah {count] servis ke Franz! Dapatkan aplikasi percuma WhatsApp, Messenger, Slack, Skype dan lain-lain dari www.meetfranz.com
feature.shareFranz.shareText.twitter: Saya telah menambahkan {count} perkhidmatan kepada Franz! Dapatkan app percuma untuk WhatsApp, Messenger, Slack, Skype dan lain lain di www.meetfranz.com /cc @FranzMessenger
feature.shareFranz.text: Beritahu rakan anda betapa hebatnya Franz dan bantu kami menyebarkan maklumat ini
feature.todos.premium.info: Franz Todos tersedia untuk pengguna premium sekarang!

settings.team.copy: Franz for Teams gives you the option to invite co-workers to your team by sending them email invitations and manage their subscriptions in your account’s preferences. Don’t waste time setting up subscriptions for every team member individually, forget about multiple invoices and different billing cycles - one team to rule them all!
settings.team.headline: Team
settings.team.intro: You and your team use Franz? You can now manage Premium subscriptions for as many colleagues, friends or family members as you want, all from within one account.

settings.workspaces.headline: Your workspaces
settings.workspaces.noWorkspacesAdded: You haven't added any workspaces yet.
settings.workspaces.workspaceFeatureHead: Less is More: Introducing Franz Workspaces
settings.workspaces.workspaceFeatureInfo: Franz Workspaces let you focus on what’s important right now. Set up different sets of services and easily switch between them at any time. You decide which services you need when and where, so we can help you stay on top of your game - or easily switch off from work whenever you want.

workspaceDrawer.headline: Ruang kerja
workspaceDrawer.workspaceFeatureInfo:
Franz Workspaces let you focus on what’s important right now. Set up different sets of services and easily switch between them at any time.

You decide which services you need when and where, so we can help you stay on top of your game - or easily switch off from work whenever you want.
